data.title: NBA awards 2027 All-Star Game to Phoenix Suns
data.meta_description: The Phoenix Suns will host the 2027 NBA All-Star game, the league announced Thursday, giving owner Mat Ishbia a marquee event for the city roughly one year after he purchased the franchise.
